channel.title: CVE Feed for Fabrice Bellard -- libbpg
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fabrice Bellard -- libbpg

item.title: CVE-2017-2575|2024-09-17T02:56:38.606Z -- fabrice%20bellard -- libbpg
item.description: A vulnerability was found while fuzzing libbpg 0.9.7. It is a NULL pointer dereference issue due to missing check of the return value of function malloc in the BPG encoder. This vulnerability appeared while converting a malicious JPEG file to BPG.
